specialAbilities.Echolocation: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.
specialAbilities.Keen Hearing: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
specialAbilities.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
